localised_text.last_approved_text: Select Grimgor's army.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select Castle Drakenhof.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Select Castle Drakenhof.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Upgrade the Cemetery into a Barrow.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Upgrade the Cemetery into a Barrow.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select von Carstein's army.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Select von Carstein's army.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Advance von Carstein's army towards Castle Templehof.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Advance von Carstein's army towards Castle Templehof.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select Castle Drakenhof.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Select Castle Drakenhof.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select von Carstein's army.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Select von Carstein's army.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A Challenger Comes! To destroy, to conquer, to annihilate. Prepare yourself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A Challenger Comes! To destroy, to conquer, to annihilate. Prepare yourself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: They clearly fear us, they have brought reinforcements with them.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: They clearly fear us, they have brought reinforcements with them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Face your final challenge!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Face your final challenge!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More minions of the Daemon assault our rear!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More minions of the Daemon assault our rear!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defeat the Lord of Change!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defeat the Lord of Change!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill his forces and the Dragon Lord shall surely appear.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill his forces and the Dragon Lord shall surely appear.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Dragon Lord approaches, kill him and his warriors will flee!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Dragon Lord approaches, kill him and his warriors will flee!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Success! The Sorcerer is defeated! We must now seize the initiative and wipe out the remaining forces!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Success! The Sorcerer is defeated! We must now seize the initiative and wipe out the remaining forces!

localised_text.last_approved_text: This Sorcerer summons Chaos forces to his will. Destroy him before they become too powerful.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: This Sorcerer summons Chaos forces to his will. Destroy him before they become too powerful.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Sorcerer will continue summoning more reinforcements as long as he lives. We must destroy him or be overwhelmed.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Sorcerer will continue summoning more reinforcements as long as he lives. We must destroy him or be overwhelmed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slay or shatter the Chaos Sorcerer to stop his forces growing.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slay or shatter the Chaos Sorcerer to stop his forces growing.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The green things flee before us. Chase them down and destroy them!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The green things flee before us. Chase them down and destroy them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The sounds of our battle have stirred the Undead, and Fell Bats swarm at our rear.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The sounds of our battle have stirred the Undead, and Fell Bats swarm at our rear.

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Undead arrive, stronger and larger than the last!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Undead arrive, stronger and larger than the last!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Our clash has drawn a Terrorgheist from its hiding place!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Our clash has drawn a Terrorgheist from its hiding place!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Necromancers inhabiting the city have summoned their forces and emerge from the ruins. We must destroy them!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Necromancers inhabiting the city have summoned their forces and emerge from the ruins. We must destroy them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: That armour is perfection itself. Only Sigvald is worthy of wearing it!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: That armour is perfection itself. Only Sigvald is worthy of wearing it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: These repellent beasts abhor the Geld-Prince. Wipe them out!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: These repellent beasts abhor the Geld-Prince. Wipe them out!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More of the vermin approach! Slaughter them!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More of the vermin approach! Slaughter them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even more come to be made beautiful… and dead!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Even more come to be made beautiful… and dead!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We cannot wait any longer, the men have strayed too far.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: We cannot wait any longer, the men have strayed too far.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those fools are not aware of the doom that creeps upon them. Wait until the critical moment, then slaughter them all!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Those fools are not aware of the doom that creeps upon them. Wait until the critical moment, then slaughter them all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The venom has taken its toll - Graktar is no more.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The venom has taken its toll - Graktar is no more.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We have finally caught the lame beast; slaughter his worthless herd!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: We have finally caught the lame beast; slaughter his worthless herd!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Graktar joins the battle. Wounded by the venom, he's nothing but a desperate old Gor. Take his horn!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Graktar joins the battle. Wounded by the venom, he's nothing but a desperate old Gor. Take his horn!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More of Graktar's followers join the battle!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More of Graktar's followers join the battle!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slay these bulls, let the rest know who is the true master!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slay these bulls, let the rest know who is the true master!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Minotaurs have emerged!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Minotaurs have emerged!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Send these man-filth Knights to the halls of the Dark Gods!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Send these man-filth Knights to the halls of the Dark Gods!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Cannons! Stop them!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Cannons! Stop them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More cannons! Stop them firing!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More cannons! Stop them firing!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your ally cannot hold much longer.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Your ally cannot hold much longer.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Empire is deploying artillery on the hill!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Empire is deploying artillery on the hill!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Emperor is defeated!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Emperor is defeated!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The King is defeated!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The King is defeated!

localised_text.last_approved_text: This is the last hope of men. Shatter them once and for all: slay their Emperor - kill their King!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: This is the last hope of men. Shatter them once and for all: slay their Emperor - kill their King!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia flanked the warherd with Pegasus Knights!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Bretonnia flanked the warherd with Pegasus Knights!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Purge the Undead!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Purge the Undead!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beware, Grand Theogonist! The Undead filth have summoned reinforcements!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Beware, Grand Theogonist! The Undead filth have summoned reinforcements!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Their Lord is down! The political landscape has shifted. The Reiksguard can commit without endangering the Emperor's position!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Their Lord is down! The political landscape has shifted. The Reiksguard can commit without endangering the Emperor's position!

localised_text.last_approved_text: There is the Ar-Ulric's champion - slay him in Sigmar's name and the Reiksguard will join the fray to ensure the Staff of Command is returned to its rightful owner!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: There is the Ar-Ulric's champion - slay him in Sigmar's name and the Reiksguard will join the fray to ensure the Staff of Command is returned to its rightful owner!

localised_text.last_approved_text: These wolves are cunning! The Ulricans' hidden reinforcements have revealed themselves!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: These wolves are cunning! The Ulricans' hidden reinforcements have revealed themselves!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slay the Strigoi Ghoul King to prevent his servants from being resurrected.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slay the Strigoi Ghoul King to prevent his servants from being resurrected.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slay the Arch Lector and claim the excavation as your own!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slay the Arch Lector and claim the excavation as your own!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Curse them! More Empire soldiers arrive to thwart us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Curse them! More Empire soldiers arrive to thwart us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slaughter the cattle!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slaughter the cattle!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The cowards have brought more artillery to bear!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The cowards have brought more artillery to bear!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beware, the Strigoi Ghoul King has been granted special powers by Nagash, through which he may resurrect his minions indefinitely.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Beware, the Strigoi Ghoul King has been granted special powers by Nagash, through which he may resurrect his minions indefinitely.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slaughtered soldiers will rise again, only this time far stronger than before.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slaughtered soldiers will rise again, only this time far stronger than before.

localised_text.last_approved_text: More monsters heed their Ghoul King's call!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More monsters heed their Ghoul King's call!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Mage Queen sends forth her champions to slay you. Ha! It is they who shall be slayed!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Mage Queen sends forth her champions to slay you. Ha! It is they who shall be slayed!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More tree-huggers have dared enter the battlefield. They shall meet their deaths this day!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More tree-huggers have dared enter the battlefield. They shall meet their deaths this day!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen enable the wounded Wood Elves to be healed.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen enable the wounded Wood Elves to be healed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen grow stronger!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen grow stronger!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen have reached their peak. If you cut away a single limb, two grow back in its place!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The blessings of the Mage Queen have reached their peak. If you cut away a single limb, two grow back in its place!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Glade Guards are over-run! Now, only your own force can stop the Undead onslaught!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Glade Guards are over-run! Now, only your own force can stop the Undead onslaught!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A group of Glade Guards is being overwhelmed by Strigoi Ghoul Kings!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A group of Glade Guards is being overwhelmed by Strigoi Ghoul Kings!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kemmler's apprentice controls the Undead horde. Slay him and his dark servants!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kemmler's apprentice controls the Undead horde. Slay him and his dark servants!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Necromancer summons the rest of his dark legion. Repel their attack and victory will be yours!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Necromancer summons the rest of his dark legion. Repel their attack and victory will be yours!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The spirits of the forest come to our aid! Together we can defeat the remaining Beastmen.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The spirits of the forest come to our aid! Together we can defeat the remaining Beastmen.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Khazrak the One-eye has been spotted on the right flank. Stop him before he can overwhelm our defenses!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Khazrak the One-eye has been spotted on the right flank. Stop him before he can overwhelm our defenses!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Malagor's brayherd is approaching our positions from the left flank!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Malagor's brayherd is approaching our positions from the left flank!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur and his spawn advance on the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur and his spawn advance on the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur, Malagor the Dark Omen and Khazrak the One-eye have joined forces to corrupt the heart of Athel Loren. Ensure they come no further.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur, Malagor the Dark Omen and Khazrak the One-eye have joined forces to corrupt the heart of Athel Loren. Ensure they come no further.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's protective aura will be weakened in

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's protective aura will be weakened in

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened. Attack him now!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened. Attack him now!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's aura is at full strength again. Wait for your chance...

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's aura is at full strength again. Wait for your chance...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened again. Attack him now!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened again. Attack him now!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Beastlord may be immortal, but bleeds as surely as any other living creature. Keep attacking him when his aura is weakened to ensure our victory!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Beastlord may be immortal, but bleeds as surely as any other living creature. Keep attacking him when his aura is weakened to ensure our victory!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now the Corrupter is nothing but shadows, fading away into nothingness. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Now the Corrupter is nothing but shadows, fading away into nothingness. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's dark aura protects him from all sources of damage. Take on his minions whilst awaiting the opportunity to slay the Beastlord himself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's dark aura protects him from all sources of damage. Take on his minions whilst awaiting the opportunity to slay the Beastlord himself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beastmen are emerging from all directions! Chaos is rife!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Beastmen are emerging from all directions! Chaos is rife!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened for

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Morghur's protective aura is weakened for

localised_text.last_approved_text: This Glade Lord failed to resist the lure of the Ruinous Powers. Slay her and her corrupted retinue!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: This Glade Lord failed to resist the lure of the Ruinous Powers. Slay her and her corrupted retinue!

localised_text.last_approved_text: In the heat of the battle, your enemies fall down without warning. Suddenly, Chaos Spawn bursts forth from the remains of the Elves they used to be!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: In the heat of the battle, your enemies fall down without warning. Suddenly, Chaos Spawn bursts forth from the remains of the Elves they used to be!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill the Bray-Shaman, his influence over the herd cannot be over-stated!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill the Bray-Shaman, his influence over the herd cannot be over-stated!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Beastmen have brought a Cygor to the battle! Kill that monster with haste!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Beastmen have brought a Cygor to the battle! Kill that monster with haste!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Touched by Morghur's twisted, evil essence, the Bray-Shaman is damaging your troops.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Touched by Morghur's twisted, evil essence, the Bray-Shaman is damaging your troops.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The power of the Corruptor grows stronger, greatly increasing the damage he is able to inflict.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The power of the Corruptor grows stronger, greatly increasing the damage he is able to inflict.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your troops are dying merely by looking upon the monster's terrifying countenance!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Your troops are dying merely by looking upon the monster's terrifying countenance!

localised_text.last_approved_text: With the Bray-Shaman's death, the dark aura upon your soldiers dies with him. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: With the Bray-Shaman's death, the dark aura upon your soldiers dies with him. Clear the battlefield and claim your victory!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The champion of Anath Raema, the murderer of its own kin, now stands before the great Oak. Slay him at once, and bring justice to the fallen!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The champion of Anath Raema, the murderer of its own kin, now stands before the great Oak. Slay him at once, and bring justice to the fallen!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Further rebel forces haved joined the battle.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Further rebel forces haved joined the battle.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Filthy Greenskins have polluted the vault of the Ancestors! Cleanse it of their stench!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Filthy Greenskins have polluted the vault of the Ancestors! Cleanse it of their stench!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Greenskins attack from the flank!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Greenskins attack from the flank!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskins act like trapped rats! They have nothing left to lose - beware their vicious attacks!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Greenskins act like trapped rats! They have nothing left to lose - beware their vicious attacks!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Your allies have been out-flanked by the Greenskin horde, help them before they are destroyed.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Your allies have been out-flanked by the Greenskin horde, help them before they are destroyed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those nasty little stunties hate a surprise - ambush and kill 'em, da gitz!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Those nasty little stunties hate a surprise - ambush and kill 'em, da gitz!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More horrid little stunties enter the battle - the gitz!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More horrid little stunties enter the battle - the gitz!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right boyz, this is not a new concept. We need to kill those stunted little gitz with 'extreem prej-oo-dis'!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Right boyz, this is not a new concept. We need to kill those stunted little gitz with 'extreem prej-oo-dis'!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those bearded gitz, the Dwarfs, are attacking from a different direction - curse 'em! Kill 'em!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Those bearded gitz, the Dwarfs, are attacking from a different direction - curse 'em! Kill 'em!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dis git thinks a mask alone makes him Da Great Green Prophet, for which he deserves to die. Painfully. At once!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Dis git thinks a mask alone makes him Da Great Green Prophet, for which he deserves to die. Painfully. At once!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Zog it! Da enemy 'ave been spotted on the flanks! It's an ambush!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Zog it! Da enemy 'ave been spotted on the flanks! It's an ambush!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those Empire gitz are gathering for a scrap - kill their commanders to stop 'em reinforcing!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Those Empire gitz are gathering for a scrap - kill their commanders to stop 'em reinforcing!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Empire commanders are in disarray! Their army is fallin' apart! Good!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Empire commanders are in disarray! Their army is fallin' apart! Good!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Gut the sneaky bastard and 'is army! That'll teach him to mess with my Squiggly Beast!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Gut the sneaky bastard and 'is army! That'll teach him to mess with my Squiggly Beast!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Here come those bouncing, explodin' Squigs - shoot 'em from afar, we're in trouble if they catch up wiv us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Here come those bouncing, explodin' Squigs - shoot 'em from afar, we're in trouble if they catch up wiv us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ha, these mercenaries are cowards! They use handguns and cannons to fell our brave Knights rather than risk ignominious death in honest, noble melee. Show them true Bretonnian steel – charge them down before our numbers dwindle too much!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Ha, these mercenaries are cowards! They use handguns and cannons to fell our brave Knights rather than risk ignominious death in honest, noble melee. Show them true Bretonnian steel – charge them down before our numbers dwindle too much!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Norscan raiders have already landed a part of their force. Drive them into the sea before more disembark and unite against us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Norscan raiders have already landed a part of their force. Drive them into the sea before more disembark and unite against us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A second force of raiders have arrived on the shore. Rally your forces and drive them back!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A second force of raiders have arrived on the shore. Rally your forces and drive them back!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A third, smaller wave of marauders are preparing their assault. They shall know the power of the Lady when she strikes them down where they stand!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A third, smaller wave of marauders are preparing their assault. They shall know the power of the Lady when she strikes them down where they stand!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Goblins have placed artillery on the cliffs ahead of us. They must be stopped - preferably by killing the entire force of evil, green scum!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Goblins have placed artillery on the cliffs ahead of us. They must be stopped - preferably by killing the entire force of evil, green scum!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Azhag the Slaughterer advances on us! Destroy his Orcish forces!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Azhag the Slaughterer advances on us! Destroy his Orcish forces!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wurrzag's Savage Orcs are closing in on us! Truly, this onslaught knows no end!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Wurrzag's Savage Orcs are closing in on us! Truly, this onslaught knows no end!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Knights Errant have returned to our aid! Our foes will feel the earth shake from their charge!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Knights Errant have returned to our aid! Our foes will feel the earth shake from their charge!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The threat is very real and not over yet. Grimgor Ironhide comes to challenge us, with his mightiest Orcs in tow. Slay him and end this menace to mankind!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The threat is very real and not over yet. Grimgor Ironhide comes to challenge us, with his mightiest Orcs in tow. Slay him and end this menace to mankind!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The forces of Chaos, led by Archaon, are ranged against us. The Knights Errant are ready to sweep them away with their mighty charge, but without support their bravery will go to waste!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The forces of Chaos, led by Archaon, are ranged against us. The Knights Errant are ready to sweep them away with their mighty charge, but without support their bravery will go to waste!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The pilgrims have survived the trials of the Chaos Wastes and come to our aid. This is a chance for even the lowliest peasants to prove their courage.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The pilgrims have survived the trials of the Chaos Wastes and come to our aid. This is a chance for even the lowliest peasants to prove their courage.

localised_text.last_approved_text: To the sound of rumbling thunder, Kholek Suneater has arrived on the field!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: To the sound of rumbling thunder, Kholek Suneater has arrived on the field!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The daemonic powers of Chaos are unending. Stand firm and may the Lady bless your noble, righteous blades!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The daemonic powers of Chaos are unending. Stand firm and may the Lady bless your noble, righteous blades!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Orcish raiders have decided to meet our challenge rather than scurrying away! Show them the folly of crossing blades with the bravest of Bretonnia!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Orcish raiders have decided to meet our challenge rather than scurrying away! Show them the folly of crossing blades with the bravest of Bretonnia!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Night Goblins waited patiently while we slaughtered their bigger cousins. Now they sniff an opportunity to take the spoils for themselves!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Night Goblins waited patiently while we slaughtered their bigger cousins. Now they sniff an opportunity to take the spoils for themselves!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A gleeful cackle can be heard echoing through the woods. Be on your guard!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A gleeful cackle can be heard echoing through the woods. Be on your guard!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A small force of Goblins has flanked us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A small force of Goblins has flanked us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select Grimgor Ironhide

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Select Grimgor Ironhide

localised_text.last_approved_text: Move Grimgor Ironhide forwards

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Move Grimgor Ironhide forwards

localised_text.last_approved_text: Rout the Red Fangs skirmish attack

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Rout the Red Fangs skirmish attack

localised_text.last_approved_text: [DONT TRANSLATE] Defeat the enemy general

scripted_objectives.localised_text: [DONT TRANSLATE] Defeat the enemy general

localised_text.last_approved_text: Time to cut these monsters down to size!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Time to cut these monsters down to size!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Drawn by the sounds of battle, more Trolls have arrived.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Drawn by the sounds of battle, more Trolls have arrived.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Lured by the smell of blood, even more Trolls join the fight.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Lured by the smell of blood, even more Trolls join the fight.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Clear the Troll Country of monstrous foes.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Clear the Troll Country of monstrous foes.

localised_text.last_approved_text: It seems the Undead have found us first. Let us show them the quality of Dwarfen Gromril!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: It seems the Undead have found us first. Let us show them the quality of Dwarfen Gromril!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We have tarried here too long! Undead reinforcements approach from the marshes!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: We have tarried here too long! Undead reinforcements approach from the marshes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The manlings finally arrive. Better late than never!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The manlings finally arrive. Better late than never!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Rally the warriors, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Rally the warriors, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskins!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Greenskins!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kruti! The manlings are waylaid! Shields!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kruti! The manlings are waylaid! Shields!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend Black Fire Pass!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend Black Fire Pass!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beware, monstrous foes attack from the rear!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Beware, monstrous foes attack from the rear!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskins think they have us cornered. How unlucky for them...

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Greenskins think they have us cornered. How unlucky for them...

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Goblins have you surrounded! Fend off their impending ambush!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Goblins have you surrounded! Fend off their impending ambush!

localised_text.last_approved_text: By Grungni! We are ambushed by the foul Greenskins! To me, to me! We make our stand here!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: By Grungni! We are ambushed by the foul Greenskins! To me, to me! We make our stand here!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let your axes sing with the unclean blood of Chaos minions.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Let your axes sing with the unclean blood of Chaos minions.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Fend off the Chaos invaders so we can repair the Axe of Dargo!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Fend off the Chaos invaders so we can repair the Axe of Dargo!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ha - this vile Lord is no fool, they come at us from behind on their black steeds. No matter! I will have his head or die trying - either way I fulfil my oath!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Ha - this vile Lord is no fool, they come at us from behind on their black steeds. No matter! I will have his head or die trying - either way I fulfil my oath!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Waaagh! may have come to the Broken Leg Gully, but this place will be their tomb!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Waaagh! may have come to the Broken Leg Gully, but this place will be their tomb!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The echoes of our march has attracted some Trolls!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The echoes of our march has attracted some Trolls!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Annihilate all the Greenskins in these mountains!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Annihilate all the Greenskins in these mountains!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Crush the Undead horde back into the ground!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Crush the Undead horde back into the ground!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Grind the Undead into dust!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Grind the Undead into dust!

localised_text.last_approved_text: For the Slayer King! Wipe out the Undead.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: For the Slayer King! Wipe out the Undead.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The enemy Lord approaches.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The enemy Lord approaches.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The crypt doors have swung open and more Undead pour forth!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The crypt doors have swung open and more Undead pour forth!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Put those bones back in their tombs!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Put those bones back in their tombs!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defeat the Undead and claim the tomb!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defeat the Undead and claim the tomb!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defeat the Greenskin robbers and claim the Gromril for yourself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defeat the Greenskin robbers and claim the Gromril for yourself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskin raiders are pouring from the passes!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Greenskin raiders are pouring from the passes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We must defeat these forces and lure out the guardian to slay it!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: We must defeat these forces and lure out the guardian to slay it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The enemy Lord approaches…

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The enemy Lord approaches…

localised_text.last_approved_text: A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A force led by a Vampire Lord approaches! Defeat it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Quickly, attack, or they will surely summon the Suneater!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Quickly, attack, or they will surely summon the Suneater!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defeat the Chaos horde before they summon the Shaggoth!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defeat the Chaos horde before they summon the Shaggoth!

localised_text.last_approved_text: They come, they come! I channel the Winds Of Chamon - I'll have them as bronze statuary before they finish me!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: They come, they come! I channel the Winds Of Chamon - I'll have them as bronze statuary before they finish me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Orr shall never be Patriarch! We shall wipe him out, utterly.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Orr shall never be Patriarch! We shall wipe him out, utterly.

localised_text.last_approved_text: That cur has brought sellswords to attack us from the woods! Defend yourself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: That cur has brought sellswords to attack us from the woods! Defend yourself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Praise Sigmar! The doughty Dwarfs have come to aid us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Praise Sigmar! The doughty Dwarfs have come to aid us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Rally the men, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Rally the men, Greenskins sighted atop the hill!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskins! Let us purge the Old World of these brutes!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Greenskins! Let us purge the Old World of these brutes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Sigmar's blood! The Dwarfs are waylaid. Defend yourselves!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Sigmar's blood! The Dwarfs are waylaid. Defend yourselves!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend the pass, let not a single Goblin through to our lands beyond!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend the pass, let not a single Goblin through to our lands beyond!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Todbringer's forces approach the meeting place. Stay calm and strike when the time is right.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Todbringer's forces approach the meeting place. Stay calm and strike when the time is right.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The secessionists approach the meeting site. We should hide to surprise them!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The secessionists approach the meeting site. We should hide to surprise them!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wipe out the forces of Middenheim for daring to oppose our rule!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Wipe out the forces of Middenheim for daring to oppose our rule!

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[img:ui/skins/default/panel_title_attacker.png]] Wipe out the secessionists

scripted_objectives.localised_text: [[img:ui/skins/default/panel_title_attacker.png]] Wipe out the secessionists

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Norscans stream forth from the beaches. Push them back to the sea!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Norscans stream forth from the beaches. Push them back to the sea!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet more of the enemy emerge from their ships!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Yet more of the enemy emerge from their ships!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Still they continue to flood in like the tide itself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Still they continue to flood in like the tide itself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The thief thinks herself safe on that rock. Show her how wrong she is!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The thief thinks herself safe on that rock. Show her how wrong she is!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The witch has summoned reinforcements!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The witch has summoned reinforcements!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Cleanse the hill of all Unliving creatures!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Cleanse the hill of all Unliving creatures!

localised_text.last_approved_text: What fools! To come into our lands. Let us show then that the night is full of darkness and shadows!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: What fools! To come into our lands. Let us show then that the night is full of darkness and shadows!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slaughter dose humies! Rush through their forces and destroy 'em!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slaughter dose humies! Rush through their forces and destroy 'em!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dem armoured mugs is in da way of our loot!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Dem armoured mugs is in da way of our loot!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Undead flying gits approach from both sides!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Undead flying gits approach from both sides!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Destroy the Chaos and Undead Forces defending the city.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Destroy the Chaos and Undead Forces defending the city.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Show 'em why Azhag is called "the Slaughterer"!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Show 'em why Azhag is called "the Slaughterer"!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beware, a tankity-tank approaches!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Beware, a tankity-tank approaches!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Destroy da humie regiment!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Destroy da humie regiment!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let's do dat flankin' move and cut off their reinforcements.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Let's do dat flankin' move and cut off their reinforcements.

localised_text.last_approved_text: More gits approach from the south.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More gits approach from the south.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slaughter the stunty gits!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Slaughter the stunty gits!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Drive the Dwarfs off these mountains!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Drive the Dwarfs off these mountains!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill the Chaos forces and claim their shiny fings!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill the Chaos forces and claim their shiny fings!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Their scattered units are reforming and joining the main host!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Their scattered units are reforming and joining the main host!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Destroy the entire Chaos Warhost!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Destroy the entire Chaos Warhost!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The stunties are beaten, run them down!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The stunties are beaten, run them down!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Empire are all but defeated, finish them off

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Empire are all but defeated, finish them off

localised_text.last_approved_text: The beardy gits have arrived... More meat for the Grinder!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The beardy gits have arrived... More meat for the Grinder!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ha! The puny humies think they can stop us!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Ha! The puny humies think they can stop us!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defeat all opposing armies!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defeat all opposing armies!

localised_text.last_approved_text: You 'eard 'im! Let's smash up dem stunties!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: You 'eard 'im! Let's smash up dem stunties!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Up dere! Their whirly-gig reinforcements have arrived!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Up dere! Their whirly-gig reinforcements have arrived!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Crush the Dwarfs!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Crush the Dwarfs!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Attack and defeat the enemy army!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Attack and defeat the enemy army!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ambush the enemy and wipe out their forces!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Ambush the enemy and wipe out their forces!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Destroy the enemy reinforcements!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Destroy the enemy reinforcements!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend yourself against the enemy army!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend yourself against the enemy army!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend yourself against the ambushing enemy!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend yourself against the ambushing enemy!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend yourself against the enemy reinforcements!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend yourself against the enemy reinforcements!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill the enemy Lord to rout their forces!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill the enemy Lord to rout their forces!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yes, my pretties! The Chaos tribe flees! Strike them down swiftly as they run...

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Yes, my pretties! The Chaos tribe flees! Strike them down swiftly as they run...

localised_text.last_approved_text: It's a trap!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: It's a trap!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The rabble will not let Krell's sword fall into the hands of others. Prepare yourself!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The rabble will not let Krell's sword fall into the hands of others. Prepare yourself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Good! Good! More meat for the grinder!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Good! Good! More meat for the grinder!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Claim the Chaos Tomb Blade!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Claim the Chaos Tomb Blade!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Defend the tomb, it is ours now!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Defend the tomb, it is ours now!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Greenskins are nearing the tomb, time to close our trap!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Greenskins are nearing the tomb, time to close our trap!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The main horde has arrived, kill them all!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The main horde has arrived, kill them all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: From the trees! Spider Riders!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: From the trees! Spider Riders!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The mercenaries, realising their error, flee before the Undead hordes.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The mercenaries, realising their error, flee before the Undead hordes.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The fools fight one another. Shall we let them kill one another or join in? If they see us the Empire will surely flee!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The fools fight one another. Shall we let them kill one another or join in? If they see us the Empire will surely flee!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wipe out these Greenskin scum so we can find the location!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Wipe out these Greenskin scum so we can find the location!

localised_text.last_approved_text: More Greenskin vermin approach.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: More Greenskin vermin approach.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill these peasants so that we can claim the armour!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill these peasants so that we can claim the armour!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those Shamans hide on the hill. We must wipe them out, but also be careful of the forces approaching from our flanks!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Those Shamans hide on the hill. We must wipe them out, but also be careful of the forces approaching from our flanks!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill or rout all the Greenskin Shamans.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Kill or rout all the Greenskin Shamans.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Beastmen are products of the Chaos Lord's dark rituals. They are no ordinary Gors - beware!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Beastmen are products of the Chaos Lord's dark rituals. They are no ordinary Gors - beware!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A tide of Chaos Spawn has arrived!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A tide of Chaos Spawn has arrived!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Chaos forces keep on coming - clearly the Blood God is hungry!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Chaos forces keep on coming - clearly the Blood God is hungry!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet more Chaos Warriors come, intending to defend the monolith from attack.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: Yet more Chaos Warriors come, intending to defend the monolith from attack.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The ancient ruin is protected by Undead guardians. See them rise in its defence!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The ancient ruin is protected by Undead guardians. See them rise in its defence!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The violence attracts more Undead lurking near to the battlefield.

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The violence attracts more Undead lurking near to the battlefield.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskins are swarming your Dwarfen brothers. Join the battle and bring the Dawi the victory that is their right!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The Greenskins are swarming your Dwarfen brothers. Join the battle and bring the Dawi the victory that is their right!

localised_text.last_approved_text: A further tide of disgusting Greenskins have arrived - look to the flanks!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: A further tide of disgusting Greenskins have arrived - look to the flanks!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The champion of this frenzied herd of beasts is a blood-hungry Gorebull. Kill him before he tears us apart!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The champion of this frenzied herd of beasts is a blood-hungry Gorebull. Kill him before he tears us apart!

localised_text.last_approved_text: These men know not what they protect. Slaughtering them will spill enough blood to draw forth the Ancient...

scripted_objectives.localised_text: These men know not what they protect. Slaughtering them will spill enough blood to draw forth the Ancient...

localised_text.last_approved_text: The blood soaking the battlefield has lured the Ancient from his crypt. It is time to destroy his forces and use his essence for the ritual!

scripted_objectives.localised_text: The blood soaking the battlefield has lured the Ancient from his crypt. It is time to destroy his forces and use his essence for the ritual!
